symptomAnalyzerDescription: Describe your symptoms, and our AI will suggest potential over-the-counter medicines and a general medical specialty for informational purposes. This is not medical advice.
symptomsPlaceholder: e.g., I have a runny nose, mild cough, and a slight headache...
suggestedMedicinesInfo: Based on your symptoms, here are some general suggestions. Always read labels and consult a healthcare professional.
noMedicineSuggestionsInfo: The AI could not provide specific medicine suggestions based on the input. Please consult a healthcare professional for advice.
analysisResultsDescription: The following are AI-generated informational suggestions.
validationFailedMessage: Validation failed. Please check the form for errors.
validationLocationMinChars: Location must be at least {count} characters.
validationLocationMaxChars: Location must be at most {count} characters.
validationSpecialtyMaxChars: Specialty must be at most {count} characters.
errorDuringSearchMessage: An error occurred while searching for {entity_plural}.
noDataGenerated: AI could not generate illustrative {entity} data for your query{specialtyString}. Try a different location or broader terms.
footerDisclaimer: This tool provides AI-generated information and is not a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Always seek the advice of your physician or other qualified health provider with any questions you may have regarding a medical condition.
suggestedMedicalSpecialtyInfo: Considering your symptoms, you might want to research or consult a professional in: {specialty}.
suggestedMedicalSpecialtyDisclaimer: This is an AI-generated suggestion and not a medical referral. Consult a healthcare provider for actual medical needs.
suggestedDietPlanDisclaimer: This diet plan is AI-generated for informational purposes and is not a substitute for professional dietary or medical advice. Consult with a nutritionist or healthcare provider before making any significant dietary changes.
adminLoginFailed: Login failed. Please check your credentials.
createPostDescription: Fill in the details below to publish a new article.
postTitlePlaceholder: Enter the title of your blog post
postContentPlaceholder: Write your blog post content here...
postExcerptPlaceholder: Write a short summary or teaser for the post...
welcomeAdminDescription: Here's an overview of your MediSeek application.
dashboardOverviewContent: From here, you can manage blog posts, view analytics (feature coming soon!), and configure application settings (feature coming soon!). Use the sidebar to navigate.
deleteConfirmationMessage: Are you sure you want to delete the post "{postTitle}"? This action cannot be undone.
noBlogPostsFoundAdminDescription: There are currently no blog posts. Why not create one?
blogPostDeletionErrorNotFound: Failed to delete: Post not found.
blogPostErrorIdMissing: Post ID is missing. Cannot delete.
manageBlogsErrorLoading: An error occurred while loading blog posts for management. Please try again later.
blogPostUpdateErrorNotFound: Failed to update: Post not found.
validationPostIdRequired: Post ID is required for an update.
postNotFoundMessage: The blog post with slug "{slug}" could not be found.
